Windows Ie 6 Final Is Out

26 Aug 2001

\nInternet Explorer 6 final is out for windows. Hopefully they've worked all the bugs out from the public beta. They're claiming 100% standards support for DOM level 1 and CSS 1 (it only took five years!), though time will tell how accurate that claim is.\n
